description.value: Maps (test) result status codes as found in the Dutch zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) [LaboratoryTestResult v4.6 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/LaboratoryTestResult-v4.6(2020EN)) to <http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/valueset-observation-status> as found in `Observation.status` in FHIR R4. This ConceptMap can be used for both the ResultStatusCodelist and TestResultStatusCodelist, which have the same content.
